long_description: The REI Pack Duffel bag encloses your backpack or child carrier for protection from rough handling during air, train and auto travel. Features a top carry handle and an adjustable single shoulder strap. Zippered opening is at the end of duffel for easy loading and unloading. Clear I.D. window pocket on top allows easy identification. When empty, duffel conveniently folds up into a small zippered pouch you can take anywhere.
short_description: The REI Pack Duffel bag encloses your backpack or child carrier for protection from rough handling during air, train and auto travel.
